sub_title: Electrical Commissioning Engineer at HDR | Hurley Palmer Flatt Group
summary:
A highly skilled electrical engineer, that in more than thirty years has gathered both technical knowledges and professional expertise to render any future project collaboration into a success story.
Attitude it's everything and coupled with my commitment and extensive experience of more than 12 projects worldwide, should constitute a sure path of a well done, safe and sound job.
Experience includes both operation and maintenance of High, Medium and Low Voltage electrical equipments and hands on commissioning, functional tests and start-up of High, Medium and Low Voltage electrical equipments. 
Conversant with tracking systems softwares such as: 
- Construction and Commissioning Management System (CCMS) program and a Preservation system WinPCS 
- TOSTR (Turn Over Systems Tracking and Recording)

profile_positions.description:
Level 3 documentation review
Level 4 documentation review
Level 4 testing completion
Level 5 testing script delivery
Level 5 testing completion
profile_positions.title: Electrical Commissioning Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Involved in Pre-Power on, L3 testing and paperwork.
Review and compile the L4 testing scripts/test procedure. 
Delivery of Level 4&5 testing for MV and HV.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Commissioning Engineer-HV

profile_positions.description:
Oversee Commissioning of Electrical distribution systems.
Delivery of Level 4&5 testing for LV, MV and HV (GIS) electrical equipment, including stability test and HI REF for 150 MVA transformers.
profile_positions.title: Senior Electrical Commissioning Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Reporting to Island commissioning manager.  
Fully aware of Safety rules and regulations with strong orientation in implementing the safety performance of pre-commissioning and commissioning activities .
Ensure safe execution of commissioning activities and compliance of whole team with HSE rules and regulation
Managing and oversee a full  commissioning team, both the Petrofac and subcontractors. 
Plan, coordinate and supervise execution of commissioning activities and tests, according with project standards and requirements.
Monitor Subcontractors’ activities in preparation for  commissioning execution. 
Participate in Commissioning reviews including vendors, spares, tools, tests, equipments, etc.
Monitor EPC Contractors performance against agreed work schedules
Provide input and report to Commissioning Manager on any schedule risks arising from deficiencies in performance of Contractors, and cooperate to implement corrective action as required
Provide input to Completions Team's schedule, sequence and handover strategy.
Carryout low voltage and high voltage switching and isolations, in accordance with PTW and LOTO procedure.
Diagnose faults and identify solutions to correct problems on switchgears.
Permit to work issuing authority and SAEP
profile_positions.title: Principal Commissioning Engineer-Electrical

profile_positions.description:
Responsible with coordinating commissioning activities of electrical equipments.
Part of the team responsible for walk downs, punch list and completion documentation.
Liaise with vendor for the correct implementation of designs/new modifications. 
Providing guidance and support to the main contractor and vendors for the both compilation of the commissioning procedures and in carrying out the commissioning and start-up activities.
Ensure the commissioning activities are complete and the RFSU certificate has been issued prior commencement of start-up activities.
Coordinating the energization of the substations and downstream equipment e.g. motors, transformers, VSDs, UPS, Invertors, HVAC, Power panels, Control panels, Lighting panels.
Ensuring adherence of the subcontractors and vendors to comply with the agreed established procedures.
Conduct walk downs of systems under commissioning, to ensure that the HSE requirements are as per company standards.
profile_positions.title: Commissioning Supervisor-Electrical B-3a

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for coordinating commissioning activities of low and medium voltage transformers and switchgears.
Involved in planning  commissioning activities.
Liaison with client and vendors.
Ensures that the commissioning procedures are in place and complete prior to the commencement of site activities.
Conduct walk downs of systems under commissioning, to ensure that the HSE requirements are as per company standards and drawing up the snag list of systems under commissioning.
Part of the completion team and responsible for handing over the systems within the planning date and meet the milestones. 
PTW coordinator and responsible for LOTO Implementation.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Commissioning Manager

profile_positions.description:
Leading pre-commissioning and commissioning activities of 26 Modules, Local Electrical Rooms and Local Instrument Rooms (LER’s/LIR’s).
Responsible for the coordination of pre-commissioning and commissioning activities within the Fabrication Yard, and the liaison with contractors, subcontractors, and vendors.
Providing guidance and support to the Module Fabricator for the compilation of the pre-            commissioning procedures.
The reviewing and checking of procedures required for the pre-commissioning and commissioning activities.
Ensures that the pre-commissioning and commissioning procedures are in place and complete prior to the commencement of Fabrication Yard activities.
The recording and signing of completed and accepted commissioning activities on the designated TOSTR forms.
Liaise with TOSTR for the supply of forms prior to inspection, and the timely inclusion of completed forms to the database.
profile_positions.title: Commissioning Principal Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Commissioning and Start-Up of a New LNG Train. 
Coordinating the commissioning and start-up activities and testing. Part of the team responsible for walk downs, punch list, documentation and turn over packages. Responsible for vendor’s activities and testing on-site. Supervising the testing of the fife Nuovo Pignone generators, done by the Brush and Multiline vendors for excitation and control. Protective relays comm. includes: Sepam, Tesys-T from Schneider and GE Multiline G-60.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Commissioning Superintendent

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all Electrical Pre-Comm/Comm and start up activities, testing, documentation and turnover packages. LOTO authority and PTW coordinator.
Coordination of vendors on-site activities with craft and supervisors/contractor team, compiling and checking method statements, procedures, correlating the drawings between our engineering and vendors, coordinating  commissioning tests activities, improving the schematic diagrams in according with project requirements, others.
Protective relays comm. includes: REF 542 Plus (ABB), SEL 2505 Remote I/O Module, Siprotec Relay (Siemens), Simocod Relay (Siemens), GE Multiline Relay 489.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Commissioning Engineer

profile_positions.location: Zotti, Gassi, Brown Field, El Agreb 2, El Agreb 6 and El Agreb west
profile_positions.description: Pre-commissioning and Commissioning of electrical equipments, on a Gas Compression & Reinjection Facilities. Testing of four generators Power Plant.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Commissioning Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Pre-commissioning and Commissioning for electrical equipments on a barge with 4 generators summed 140 MW for a new experimental project offshore in Kashagan – Kazakhstan. The job consists in:
Pre-commissioning, Commissioning and start-up for electrical equipments, such as:
Step-up Transformers (11/35KV) and step-down Transformers (35/6KV, 6/0.4KV).
35 kV protections panels for line switchboard and transformers, with “REF” relay controller.
Medium voltage switchgear panels (11 kV and 6kV) with ABB electrical equipments and “REF” relays for process.
Low voltage switchgear panels (0.4 kV) with ABB electrical equipment.
Motors – 400 V, 6kV.
Protection Relay secondary injection test.
profile_positions.title: :   Electrical Commissioning Engineer
